attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a security guard i am constantly hounded by my company and companys i ve worked for to do my shift and then when aguard phones sick to cover theres this does not in my opinion conjusive to making a good working relationship between employee and employer and client  and upto now if i refuse  ithey are saying my timekeeping is not right and i have to buck up DO WE STILL LIVE IN A DICKENSIAN SOCIETY were its work or else

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
